timeline.message:
Removes recursion from get_ancestor()

I and others have been experiencing stack overflows during a long period
of non-finalisation. Removing the recursion from get_ancestor() should
help.

timeline.author: ajsutton

replies.bodyText: Given you're probably asleep and I've already written the code, I've pushed this up.  Will get @cemozerr to review. :)
replies.author: ajsutton

timeline.message: Handle unknown parent blocks in get_ancestor.

timeline.bodyText: This looks good to me, but independent from this PR, makes me wonder if throwing here when the parentRoot does not exist in our ProtoArray was the right call. Seems like we simply should be returning an empty optional when we don't have the parent root, since the parent root is potentially a root of a block in a non-finalized fork, and we should be fine with that. Will do a follow-up PR on this.
timeline.author: cemozerr

replies.bodyText: Actually throwing there does make sense because, for a block that we found the slot in the ProtoArray, we should have the complete ProtoNode anyway.
replies.author: cemozerr
